TestDescription.name: Possible internal IP address disclosure

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description: A string matching an internal IPv4 address was found on this page. This may disclose information about the IP addressing scheme of the internal network. This information can be used to conduct further attacks.[break][break][coolbox][dark]This alert may be a false positive, manual confirmation is required.[/dark][/coolbox]
TestDescription.Recommendation: Prevent this information from being displayed to the user.
